Gan_YUV422Pixel_ui16 Struct Reference
[Access Individual Pixels of an Image]

Structure defining UYVY 16-bit 4-2-2 pixel. More...

#include <gandalf/image/pixel.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

gan_uint16 UV
gan_uint16 Y

Detailed Description

Structure defining UYVY 16-bit 4-2-2 pixel.

NB cannot be used to iterate along raster because of the 4-2-2 sampling

Member Data Documentation

gan_uint16 Gan_YUV422Pixel_ui16::UV

One of the two chrominance channels, depending on the column position

gan_uint16 Gan_YUV422Pixel_ui16::Y

Luminance channel
